#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
    int arr[] = {23, 45, 80, 74, 13, 55, 73, 45, 3, 9};
    for(int i = 0; i < sizeof(arr) / sizeof(arr[0]) - 1; i++){
        int index = i;
        for(int j = i; j < sizeof(arr) / sizeof(arr[0]); j++){
            if(arr[j+1] < arr[index]){
                index = j+1;
            }      
        }
        if(index != i){
            int tmp = arr[i];
            arr[i] = arr[index];
            arr[index] = tmp;
        }
    }
    for(int i = 0; i < sizeof(arr) / sizeof(arr[0]); i++){
        printf("%d\n", arr[i]);
    }
    return 0;
}
